  color: white;

  width: 80%;

                border-radius: 50%;

#seccion3_2 {
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  height: 18rem;
  clear: both;
}
#seccion3_2 figure {
  background-color: black;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 50%;
  position: absolute;
  height: 50px;
  width: 50px;
  padding-top: 10px;
  clear: both;
}
#seccion3_2 figure a {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}
#seccion3_2 figure a img {
  width: 60%;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
#seccion3_2 #instagram {
  left: 30%;
}
#seccion3_2 #twitter {
  top: 20%;
  left: 50%;
}
#seccion3_2 #facebook {
  top: 20%;
  left: 10%;
}
#seccion3_2 #youtube {
  top: 20%;
  left: 80%;
}
#seccion3_2 #tiktok {
  top: 50%;
  left: 65%;
}
#seccion3_2 #btn_redes {
  position: absolute;
  width: 40%;
  height: 40%;
  text-align: center;
  padding-top: 50px;
  top: 30%;
  left: 15%;
  clear: both;
}
#seccion3_2 #btn_redes p {
  font-size: 1rem;
  text-decoration: underline;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 1em;
  background-color: black;
  border-radius: 200px;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
  #contenedorPrincipal {
    width: 60% !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #contenedorPrincipal {
    width: 80% !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  #contenedorPrincipal {
    width: 90% !important;
  }
  #contenedor1, #contenedor2, #contenedor3, #contenedor4 {
    width: 95% !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 400px) {
  #contenedorPrincipal {
    width: 100% !important;
  }
  #contenedor1, #contenedor2, #contenedor3, #contenedor4 {
    width: 95% !important;
  }
}
